transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: hello hi Vanessa good evening this is Candace from Christian Telecom I'm following up with you as a big read this morning to boost your internet speed for a 4K loading capability

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: oh yes hello Candace how are you

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: I'm doing fantastic I'm just about to head home I'm just doing my last calls for the day how are you

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: great great thank you I just finished work and I have talked to my husband about it um we just have a few questions before we jump into it

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: of course sure go ahead

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: I'm a little unclear about the pricing you said it was uh 25 which is a lot cheaper than my current provider and a lot faster too which is what God is interested you know sure but what I'd like to know is is 25 is going to be my regular monthly fee or is it only for a couple of months and I'll pay the regular price because if that is the case we're not interested

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: oh 25 is actually already our regular pricing for 100 megabits per second fiber connection

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: oh and no additional fee on top of 25 after a few months

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: no additional fee because that's already the regular pricing and the installation is free as well

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: oh okay then great let's do it

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: perfect so to recap real quick I've got you a plan for 100 megabits per second for a 25 monthly fee no installation fee placing the order will only take a couple of minutes I'll send you the link then I'll walk you through the steps to sign up are you ready

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: all right

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: I've just sent you the sign up link to your email vanessarroberts gmail.com

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: okay let me check

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: I got it

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: great so just click on the link and fill out the required information and you should receive a confirmation email after that

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: okay I'm doing it now

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: okay I think I'm done what's next

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: now you can choose the plan and payment method and make sure to unclick the box next to the installation fee since you already have a landline installed and click on submit order yes click on submit order and that should complete the purchase

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: okay I think I'm done I okay let me check here

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: one moment

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: congratulations I see here that the order is successful you will get your router within three business days and I will also send you a link to a video showing the step-by-step instructions on how to activate it

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: thank you but um my service will continue working until we receive the router right

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: oh definitely your service will continue working without any interruption

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: perfect we are honestly so excited about it and I hope we won't get disappointed

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: no you won't be when you're finally able to make the most out of your 4K TV with no more buffering why would you be disappointed

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: well when you put it like that it makes sense

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: and if you need help you can always call a customer service hotline and they'll be there to answer your billing and Technical questions

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: all right Candace thank you so much and we'll just wait for the router you have yourself a great evening

transcript.speaker: SalesRep
transcript.text: you too Vanessa you have a great evening bye

transcript.speaker: Customer
transcript.text: bye
